items.name: Item: Content Page
items.text: Listen to the story and then answer the questions
items.tts: A young man was driving his truck on a mountain road. He had dreadlocks and was eating a chocolate bar. He saw an older man leaning on a red sports car. The young man thought the older man was pushing his car. But this was a mistake. Actually, the old man had just finished jogging. He was tired and resting on his car. The young man decided to help. He stopped his truck, walked over to the man and the sports car, and started to push the car. He pushed the car right over the cliff, and it fell down the mountain. The older man was very surprised. It was a terrible misunderstanding.
